lines.text: Maybe the <c=#FF0000>Go Wizard</c> opened a hole in the floor with <c=#FF0000>Portable Hole!</c>
With Slick trapped in the floor, he wouldn't have been able to run!
I don't think so. For one thing... he clearly ain't trapped in the floor.
And... trapped? Does that spell even say what happens to stuff inside the hole when it closes?
Uh... not really. It was kinda bare bones- most of the detail was in the summoning ritual.
Well, the floors here aren't exactly man-sized, and... we did make sure to ask the tenant on the floor below.
She didn't say anything we didn't already know- she woke up from the gunshot, but didn't hear anything else besides the fire alarm.
More importantly, she didn't report a man's lower body danglin' into her room.
...Well, maybe she didn't report it because-
If you're about to suggest somethin' salacious, can it. We're shootin' for a T for Teen ratin', here.
Seriously? Good luck with that. There's like, blood and gruesomely charred corpses lying around.
...Eh. I'm sure we can swing it.
